response.overview: The young werewolf Mira, who was meant to be the Alpha's mate, is sentenced to a life of slavery after being set up by a jealous competitor and unintentionally killing the Alpha's brother. Breaking free from traditional horizontal constraints, GoodShort's vertical films offer a dynamic and intimate cinematic experience, capturing our vertically-oriented digital lives and catering to a generation that craves storytelling that mirrors their scroll-and-swipe reality.
response.title: The Alpha's Rejected Mate
